alert.note: Alert for Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 10:56PM CDT until April 28 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Nebraska, including the following county, Platte. * WHEN...Until 200 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1056 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Platte Center, Monroe, Tarnov, Circle H Trailer Park, Lake Ocaonee, College View Trailer Park, Lake North Babcock Campground and Shell Creek Elementary School.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
